item.title: Where do i put that code?
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

Post it wherever you’re having the beastkc variable increment.

//kills a beast, blah. c.beastKc += 1; if (c.beastKc == 200) { c.sendMessage("Enjoy!"); c.addItem(13900, 1); c.beastKc -= 200; } }
Rename your variable so it follows proper naming conventions as well.
